Hello, my name is

INAKSHI

Foodblogger, Foodlover & Fitnesslover

Welcome to my blog ! I am Inakshi and the food blogger behind The FullPlate. I started my blog to share my passion for cooking.
I love trying new things and testing them out with my family. I truly love – creating and sharing my
favourite recipes with you. I hope that you enjoy my recipes and stay connected.
